class.name: AudioFloatConverter
class.javadoc:
This class is used to convert between 8,16,24,32,32+ bit signed/unsigned big/litle endian fixed/floating point byte buffers and float buffers.
Karl Helgason

class.name: AudioFloatLSBFilter
class.javadoc: LSB Filter, used filter least significant byte in samples arrays. Is used filter out data in lsb byte when SampleSizeInBits is not dividable by 8.
